name: Dodgeball
description:
Dodgeball is a small multiplayer game which recreates the classic game of ‘Dodgeball’; as you could probably guess. It focuses on fast-paced gameplay and teamwork where robots battle each other to their deaths. Play in a school gym, maybe on the side of the volcano where falling to your lava related death is possible, or in the low gravity environment of the moon. Each arena has their own unique mechanics that influence how you play. Dodgeball has been made with playing with groups of friends in mind for small sessions of fast paced fun.Features
  • Throwing balls
  • Catching balls
  • Blocking incoming balls with a held ball
  • Exploding balls
  • 4 maps with different mechanics on each

Dodgeball is in Early Access and will be evolving over time with added content and features. Please check the website for more information on future updates for the game. Please note it does not currently have any dedicated servers so servers will have to be hosted yourself.
